thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.com.au
thread.title: Bianca

author: Bianca
title: Bianca
text: I ordered my daughters first birthday invitations through Optimalprint. I was extremely impressed with the easy to customise templates (and after doing the majority on my iPad, realised there are even more options on a computer than a mobile device!). The invitations were received really quickly, in perfect condition with envelopes, which was great. Very happy with my optimalprint experience, and plan to use them again for my wedding invitations :)
